About Me

Let me tell you more

BIO

Hello there! Thank you for wandering to my portfolio. I am a 22-year-old software engineer student at LUT University currently working on my Bachelor of Science in Engineering final thesis after which I will move onto master's degree. I am minoring in data analytics but my passion is front-end developing. Below you can see some of my past jobs.

LUT University 02/2022-04/2022

Engineering Ethics Teacher Assistant

After completing the University module on engineering ethics I was accepted as a teacher assistant on said course. My responsibilities were helping students with their course completion as well as grading their work. In addition I helped the professor with setting up the course online environment.

LUT University 08/2022 ->

LUT Driver

Our University's driver service offers rides to the new international students arriving in Lappeenranta. As a LUT driver my responsibility is to make sure the new arrivals get from the airport to their apartment and assist with possible issues regarding this. I am working in LUT Driver Service for the first few weeks of both semesters.

Porvoon Huoltomiehet Oy & Siivous Nikku Oy 2018 ->

Cleaner

Over the past 5 summers I've worked as a fulltime cleaner and during the academic year I continue the job part time to help with expenses.
